verses.name: Revelation 2:21
verses.text: And I gave her space to repent of her fornication; and she repented not.

verses.name: Revelation 2:22
verses.text: Behold, I will cast her into a bed, and them that commit adultery with her into great tribulation, except they repent of their deeds.

verses.name: Revelation 2:23
verses.text: And I will kill her children with death; and all the churches shall know that I am he which searcheth the reins and hearts: and I will give unto every one of you according to your works.
